text: niccayamaka evar nirakarittuk kontum ullurvacikalum veliyurvacikalum camamaka irukkum nilaiyil (mulu) manita camutayattirkum etanai (punitattalamaka) nam akkiyirukkiromo anta masjitul haramai vittum, melum allahvutaiya pataiyai vittum, tatuttuk kontum iruntarkalo avarkalukkum melum yar atile (masjitul haramil) aniyayam ceyvatan mulam varampu mira virumpukirano avanukkum novinai tarum vetanaiyiliruntu cuvaikkumpati nam ceyvom
